title: Help?
body:
I have just waited for League to install on my laptop for 7 hours.
Once it loaded up I was very happy.
But when I got in game I was unable to open the shop..
Whenever I pressed P it would show me champion info.
I even pressed on my gold, same thing.
When I pressed the shop itself it would just make a noise and not open the shop.
Help?

replies.body: Two things might be happening here causing this issue.  The weird noise can be due to the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) bar which automatically enabled in a recent Windows update.  The other piece may be a network issue that's having trouble keeping a strong connection, so it's can't communicate that you're trying to open shop.  Though, you may also see other issues as well like input delays.  To be sure, I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
